SPIFLASH_CORE¶

Register Listing for SPIFLASH_CORE¶

Register

Address

SPIFLASH_CORE_MMAP_DUMMY_BITS

0x82001800

SPIFLASH_CORE_MMAP_DUMMY_BITS¶

Address: 0x82001800 + 0x0 = 0x82001800
